source_text: The Tangadee Project currently consists of one granted exploration licence E52/4411 and one exploration licence application E52/4439. Pursuant to the Agreement, the Company has the right to acquire an additional granted exploration licence (E52/4413) expanding the Tangadee Project area to a total of 249 blocks or 779 km² located in the Ashburton region of Western Australia.
additional_details: The coverage area is specifically for the Tangadee project, as stated in the context of expanding the project area. The area was provided as 779 km² and converted to hectares (1 km² = 100 hectares).
